resources.string: Press the back button again to exit Meetly
Use biometric authentication to secure your Meetly app
The database has been backed up to the \"%s\" folder
Backup Meetly\'s database file to your device storage
Are you sure you want to delete all meetings in Meetly? This action cannot be undone.
Permanently delete all meetings from the database
Do you want to restore meetings from the selected file?
Restore meetings from a previously exported Meetly database file
The selected file is invalid. Operation aborted!
The selected meeting has been backed up to the \"%s\" folder. You can share this file with other Meetly users involved in the meeting so they can quickly import it into their app.
The selected meeting has been backed up to the \"%s\" folder
No meetings scheduled. Tap the button below to add a new one!
This will disappear once you schedule your first meeting
Get notified about your meetings! You can change this setting anytime in the app preferences.
PINs don’t match. Please try again.
You can share this QR code with other Meetly users involved in the meeting so they can easily import it into their app.
Remind me about meetings %s minutes in advance
Note: All reminders sent from Meetly are approximate and may occasionally be delayed.
Get Meetly %s — your personal meeting organizer — on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.sunilpaulmathew.meetly

The above text can be directly imported into Meetly by:
1. Selecting the text
2. Sharing it and choosing Meetly
The selected text is invalid. Operation aborted!
The selected time \"%s\" is in the past or too close. Operation aborted!
Export your meetings data for safekeeping and easily restore it whenever you need.
Add all the important details like date, time, location, and purpose to keep your schedule clear and organized.
A modern, secure, and easy-to-use offline application with a focus on managing your meetings.
Use Meetly completely without an internet connection or account — your data stays private and stored only on your device.
Set reminders for your meetings so you never miss an important event.
Protect your information with PIN or biometric authentication for peace of mind.
Share meeting details quickly via QR codes or files with other Meetly users.
